    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ResponseStateManager RenderKitImpl.getResponseStateManager()

  • Uses of ResponseStateManager in jakarta.faces.render

    Methods in jakarta.faces.render that return ResponseStateManager 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract ResponseStateManager RenderKit.getResponseStateManager()
    Return an instance of ResponseStateManager to handle rendering technology specific state management decisions.
    ResponseStateManager RenderKitWrapper.getResponseStateManager()
    The default behavior of this method is to call RenderKit.getResponseStateManager() on the wrapped RenderKit object.
